SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT f.ifeed) AS feedCnt, COUNT(fav.ifeed) AS favCnt, u.nm, u.pic, u.created_at AS createdAt FROM t_user u LEFT JOIN t_feed f ON u.iuser = f.iuser LEFT JOIN t_feed_fav fav ON fav.iuser = u.iuser LEFT JOIN t_user_follow fo ON fo.from_iuser = fav.iuser and fav.iuser = #{loginedIuser}
WHERE u.iuser = #{targetIuser}
